en: I've read many kinds of books.
zh: 我看过很多种书。

en: I have seen various difficulties.
zh: 我经历过各种各样的困难。

en: I tried many things but failed after all.
zh: 我试了很多次，但最后还是失败了。

en: I bought many types of cloth.
zh: 我买了很多种布料。

en: I bought various pieces of cloth.
zh: 我买了各种各样的布。

en: I collect dolls from different countries.
zh: 我收集不同国家的娃娃。

en: I made use of every opportunity to improve my English.
zh: 我利用一切机会提高英语。

en: I did the work against my will.
zh: 我是违心地做了那份工作。

en: I am listening to his recital.
zh: 我在听他的演奏会。

en: Never have I seen such a smart child.
zh: 我从没见过这么聪明的孩子。

en: I have nothing to do now.
zh: 我现在没事儿干。

en: I have no money with me now.
zh: 我现在身上没带钱。

en: I was determined to help her at the risk of my life.
zh: 我下定决心哪怕冒生命危险也要帮她。

en: I have to go to the airport to meet my cousin.
zh: 我得去机场接我表哥。

en: I went shares with my cousin in the profits.
zh: 我和表哥平分了利润。

en: There is no telling when I can see her again.
zh: 谁也说不准什么时候能再见到她。

en: I always wear a watch so I know what time it is.
zh: 我总戴着表，好知道时间。

en: I always get up at six.
zh: 我总是六点起床。

en: I always rest for an hour after dinner.
zh: 晚饭后我总是休息一个小时。

en: I always keep a promise.
zh: 我说话算话。

en: I always keep promises.
zh: 我一向守信用。

en: I have always kept my word.
zh: 我一直都很守信用。

en: I have always kept my promises.
zh: 我从来都信守诺言。

en: I've always kept my word.
zh: 我一向说话算数。
